mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.sn_key AS "snKey", a.receivable_money AS "receivableMoney", a.revenue_money AS "revenueMoney", a.receipt_date AS "receiptDate", a.zf_state AS "zfState", a.tc_state AS "tcState", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", sm.name AS "createBy.name", sm.photo AS "createBy.photo", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.del_flag AS "delFlag"
LEFT JOIN s_member sm ON sm.id=a.create_by
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO s_receipt( id, sn_key, receivable_money, revenue_money, receipt_date, zf_state, tc_state, remarks, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{snKey}, #{receivableMoney}, #{revenueMoney}, #{receiptDate}, #{zfState}, #{tcState}, #{remarks}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE s_receipt SET sn_key = #{snKey}, receivable_money = #{receivableMoney}, revenue_money = #{revenueMoney}, receipt_date = #{receiptDate}, zf_state = #{zfState}, tc_state = #{tcState}, remarks = #{remarks}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate} WHERE id = #{id}
